location: Minquan East Road Sec. 2, Lane 113 (民權東路二段113巷), near Xingtian Temple MRT, Zhongshan District
notes: Newly renovated 3BR/2LR/1BA unit on 6F (top floor with added structure - possible illegal rooftop addition, a red flag). Fully furnished with new appliances and good natural light reported. Top-floor added structures can have heat/leak issues and may pose baby safety concerns with rooftop access or uneven flooring; no pet policy also suggests strict landlord. No elevator info confirmed - being top floor of what may be an older walkup could be difficult with a stroller and baby.
